attributes.action: Put barriers on all central London underground platforms
attributes.background:
Standing on a crowded platform can be frightening due to the possibility of falling on the tracks. Furthermore, there are incidents of people taking their own life throwing themselves in front of the trains. 
Accidentally or voluntarily, the platform can be very dangerous.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of TfL, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
